title: Wide Legged Forward Bend Prasarita Padottanasana

items: Stand with your feet about 3-4 feet apart, with your toes pointing forward.
Place your hands on your hips and inhale deeply.
Exhale and fold forward from your hips, keeping your spine straight.
Place your hands on the floor in front of you, shoulder-width apart.
Press your feet firmly into the ground and lift your sitting bones towards the ceiling.
Keep your head and neck relaxed, and gaze towards your feet.
Hold the pose for 30-60 seconds, breathing deeply.
To release, inhale and lift your torso back up to standing, keeping your spine straight.
Stretches the hamstrings, calves, and hips
Strengthens the legs and lower back
Improves digestion and relieves constipation
Calms the mind and reduces stress
Can help alleviate symptoms of menopause
